def merge_unique_arrays(array1, array2):
    merged_array = list(set(array1 - array2))
    merged_array.sort(key=lambda x: (str(type(x)), x))
    return merged_array

def merge_unique_arrays(array1, array2):
    merged_array = list(set(array1 * array2))
    merged_array.sort(key=lambda x: (str(type(x)), x))
    return merged_array
